name: Twice-baked Caesar Potatoes
description: With your Round Steamer, making twice-baked potatoes has never been faster! You can get this popular, pub-style appy on the table in 15 minutes for a fraction of the cost of ordering them at a restaurant, way less sodium, and still all the cheesy and garlicky flavours you love. Top your spuds with Better Than Bacon Topper and 3 Onion Dip Mix!
preparation: Scrub potatoes and pierce several times with a fork. Place in Round Steamer and microwave for 5–7 min, until easily pierced with a fork.
Split potatoes in half lengthwise, scoop out potatoes leaving a 1⁄4" thick shell.
Mash potato with butter, cream, Caesar Dressing Mix. Season to taste with Sea Salt and Pepper. Spoon into potato shells and top each with grated cheese.
Place potatoes on an Sheet Pan lined with Sheet Pan Liner. Bake for 5 minutes or until cheese has melted.
perfectlyBalanceYourPlate: Serve with 4 oz (113 g) lean protein and 1 cup chopped veggies.

products.name: Caesar Dressing Mix
summary: This dressing is a little bit of magic: It’s rich, creamy, full of flavor, and it has zero sodium! Take it far beyond Caesar salad and use it as a sauce for pizza, a dip for veggies, chicken fingers, and zucchini fries, or mix it in your white pasta sauce. Simply mix the blend with mayo or Greek yogurt, lemon juice, olive oil, and milk, and it’s ready for anything!
